data.name: Pheno[Core]
data.detailed_description:
A fast-paced shooter with aggressive combat, extreme mobility, and kill-or-be-killed mechanics.

Find secret totems to unlock new abilities like wall-running or grappling-hooks, allowing you to explore further into the dense jungle planet of Gorgon.

Collect the weapons from your slain foes, and unleash a torrent of destructive firepower. Scavenge the battlefield to find the right weapon at the right time.

Unleash your deadly "Tendril-Strike" attack to heal from the pain of your enemies, forcing you to get close and stay fast.

Don't run for cover....
Run for slaughter...
data.about_the_game:
A fast-paced shooter with aggressive combat, extreme mobility, and kill-or-be-killed mechanics.

Find secret totems to unlock new abilities like wall-running or grappling-hooks, allowing you to explore further into the dense jungle planet of Gorgon.

Collect the weapons from your slain foes, and unleash a torrent of destructive firepower. Scavenge the battlefield to find the right weapon at the right time.

Unleash your deadly "Tendril-Strike" attack to heal from the pain of your enemies, forcing you to get close and stay fast.

Don't run for cover....
Run for slaughter...
data.short_description: Unveil the secrets of a lost planet. Evolve new powers to meet the challenge. Erupt in brutal shooter combat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: Project utilizes Unreal Marketplace assets, which are subject to change. Product is for demo purposes, and represents very early prototyping.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains Graphic Violence, Gore, Dismemberment, and is meant for a mature audience
